nodes.bodyText: Ug, gross. What are we filtering out here? Just internal cluster tests?

Anything that is from a sourceSet other than test. The testingConventions task is really about the overlay of multiple test tasks on the test sourceset. In the previous PR I handled this by allowing to override the test tasks that should be inspected by it, but that turns out to be cumbersome when adding in x-pack projects. I'm open to other ideas...
We could, when grabbing the candidate class files for a task, filter that collection for only those class files that belong to the test source set.
